attribute.name: Strength
attribute.desc: Increases carrying capacity and increases damage for many melee weapons.

attribute.name: Agility
attribute.desc: Increases attack speed, conventional dodge, and also slightly increases movement speed.

attribute.name: Vitality
attribute.desc: Increases the maximum number of hitpoints, defence, and also slightly increase hitpoint regeneration.

attribute.name: Intelligence
attribute.desc: Involved in magic. So better not put too much in it for now...

attribute.name: Dexterity
attribute.desc: Increases conventional accuracy, decreases the proportion of warmup time to cooldown time for conventional attacks and increases the damage for many ranged weapons.

attribute.name: Willpower
attribute.desc: Increases magical dodge and decreases the proportion of warmup time to cooldown time for magical attacks.

attribute.name: Accuracy
attribute.desc: Increases the chance of outgoing physical attacks hitting their target.

modifier.additional: This modifier does not stack with other ##1Greater##0 defensive type effects.

attribute.name: Dodge
attribute.desc: Decreases the chance of incoming physical attacks hitting you.

modifier.effect: Dodge %+.2f. This modifier does not stack with other dodge modifiers.

attribute.name: M. dodge
attribute.desc: Decreases the chance of incoming magical attacks hitting you.

modifier.additional: This modifier does not stack with other ##1Magical defense##0 modifiers.

attribute.name: Bonus att. speed
attribute.desc: Increases the attack speed of all active auto-attacks.

attribute.name: HP
attribute.desc: The number of hitpoints this being has. When this drops below 0, the being dies.

modifier.additional: The modifier will still be removed normally, increasing or decreasing hp as relevant.

attribute.name: Max HP
attribute.desc: The maximum number of hitpoints this being can have.

modifier.additional: This modifier does not stack with other ##1Lesser##0 max hp type effects.
This modifier does not stack with other ##1Greater##0 max hp type effects.
This modifier does not stack with other ##1Major##0 max hp type effects.

attribute.name: HP regeneration
attribute.desc: The rate at which hitpoints are automatically replenished.

modifier.effect: You shouldn't be seeing this. Items shouldn't be affecting this layer.

modifier.additional: This modifier does not stack with other ##1Basic##0 hitpoint regeneration type effects.
This modifier does not stack with other ##1Greater##0 hitpoint regeneration type effects.

attribute.name: Movement speed
attribute.desc: The speed at which this being moves in tiles per second.

modifier.additional: This modifier does not stack with other ##1Movement speed##0 type effects.

attribute.name: Movement speed (raw)
attribute.desc: The raw movement speed of this being.

attribute.name: gp
attribute.desc: The number of gold pieces this being possesses.
